MS MCQs

    Remotely monitor and control devices with Azure IoT Hub - Summary

    »

    1. The sending of temperature and humidity values is called telemetry. What value in the following list could also be considered telemetry?

      Build date of the remote IoT Hub device

      Sensor ID

      Heartbeat


    2. What statement best describes a direct method?

      Direct methods are designed for querying, and automatically synchronizing, with the real IoT Hub device

      A direct method is a function on the device that can be invoked by the back-end app

      A direct method runs on the back-end app, updating desired properties for the remote device

      A direct method runs on the device app, without any involvement of the back-end app


    3. Only one of the following statements is true, which one?

      The name of a direct method in the device app appears as a string in the back-end app.

      Device twin tags are data shared with the IoT device.

      A direct method can contain zero, or one, parameter.

      To create a device twin, a single line of code is required.


    4. What is an IoT Hub device twin?

      A device twin is a copy of the device state information, held on the device itself.

      Device twins are duplicate hardware devices, in case one device malfunctions.

      Device twins are JSON documents that store, in the cloud, device information.
